game.title: Find the Golden Apple
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen golden apple from the goblin camp.
game.description: The golden apple was taken by the goblins during the night raid on the orchard. The orchard owner is desperate to get it back and has offered a valuable reward for its return.

task.objective: Speak to the Orchard Owner to receive your quest.
task.description: Find the Orchard Owner in the western part of town and ask him about the stolen golden apple.

task.objective: Find the location of the goblin camp.
task.description: Ask around town for information on the whereabouts of the goblin camp. Rumor has it that they've been causing trouble in the forest to the north.

task.objective: Retrieve the golden apple from the goblin camp.
task.description: Once you've located the goblin camp, sneak in and retrieve the golden apple. Be careful not to alert any of the goblins or you may have to start over.
